channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2024110168
item.description:
Report X-2024110168

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-08T12:22:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-04
  • City: ANCH
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: 1. X-2024110168 X-RAYED SHIPMENT. SAW OUTLINES THAT WERE CLUTTERED. PERFORMED PHYSICAL SEARCH AND FOUND THREE TOOLS WITH LITHIUM ION BATTERIES IN ONE PIECE OF THE SHIPMENT NO UN3481 LABEL. IN ADDITION FOUND UNDECLRED HAZMAT CORROSIVE IN ANOTHER PIECE OF THE SHIPMENT 2. X-2024110169 X RAYED SHIPMENT. IMAGE WAS CLUTTERED SP PERFORMED A PHYSICAL SEARCH. FOUND LOCKTITE ADHESIVE WITH CORROSIVE SYMBOL. CONFIRMED THAT IT WAS REGULATED AND UNCOVERED. IN ADDITION TO THE 3 LITHIUM ION BATTERIES FOUND CONTAINED IN EQUIPMENT.

item.title: Report X-2024110172
item.description:
Report X-2024110172

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-08T12:22:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-04
  • City: ANCH
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Screened shipment and saw what appeared to be aerosol cans in 1pc of this 4pc shipment. Nature of goods on 1/2 sheet states produce, awb states foodstuffs 1frz 3dry. Opened the box that had the aerosol cans and confirmed that it is 2 - 8oz cans of PAM original spray.

item.title: Report X-2024110105
item.description:
Report X-2024110105

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-01
  • City: SIT
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During Xray screening Ramp found an undeclared receiver and DG in cargo shipment. 7011 5161 15pieces 615lbs to PDX. Nolan Lougheed tendered the shipment using his company CID. Guests declined DG. Ramp found receiver and aerosols during Xray.
